en.name: Google Merchant Center (Google Shopping Feed) PRO

module.en: Export your products to Google Merchant Center, easily!

en.name: Product Catalog Export for Dynamic Ads

module.en: The Product Catalog Export for Dynamic ads module will allow you to send the list of products of your shop to Facebook and add your products in Dynamic ads for promote your goods, that increase your sales by at least 20% in just a few days.

en.name: Full Features Groups (+ Multiple Features and Quick Edit)

module.en: Using our module you can easily display product features groups on product and comparison pages. This module also displays the list of features, alligned with the selected category, in administration panel on the product page.

en.name: Google Shopping Feed (for Google Merchant Center)

module.en: The Google Shopping Feed module will allow you to send the list of products of your shop to Google Merchant Center and publish your products on Google Shopping page results, that increase your sales by at least 20% in just a few days.
Using our module you can easily display images from your Instagram account on your e-shop. This module also displays the images in a customizable way.
Using our module you can easily get an downloadable XLS products price list on your site for customers!
This module helps to increase sales in the cart by showing most relevant products as offer to buy. This product is detected by collected statistics of this user on your website.

en.name: Full Features Groups PRO (with Compare products)

module.en: Using our module you can easily display product features groups on product. This module also displays the list of features, aligned with the selected category, in administration panel on the product page. Assign several values to one product feature.
The module to protect your Back Office accounts from brute-force. Works for unknown IPs.
